scripts.build:all: npm run build:winxp && npm run build:win7 && npm run build:win10
scripts.package:winxp: npm run build:winxp && pkg dist-winxp/index.js --target node6-win-x86 --output ../build/node-drive-client-winxp.exe
scripts.package:win7: npm run build:win7 && pkg dist-win7/index.js --target node12-win-x64 --output ../build/node-drive-client-win7.exe
scripts.package:win10: npm run build:win10 && pkg dist-win10/index.js --target node18-win-x64 --output ../build/node-drive-client-win10.exe
scripts.package:all: npm run package:winxp && npm run package:win7 && npm run package:win10
